SAINT.Name: Saint Gregory the Theologian, Archbishop of Constantinople (+ 389)
Venerable Mares the Singer, of Syria (+ c. 430)
Martyrs Felicitas and her seven sons: Januarius, Felix, Philip, Sylvanus, Alexander, Vitalius and Marcial (+ c. 164)
Holy Hierarch Castinus, Bishop of Byzantium
New Hieromartyr Vladimir, Metropolitan of Kiev and Galicia (+ 1918)
Venerable Anatoly of Optina, the elder (+ 1894)
New Hieromartyr Peter, Bishop of Voronezh (+ 1929)
Icons of the Mother of God 'Calm my Sorrows', and 'Comfort in Distress and Sorrow'
